inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of CSM with correlative imaging studies (MRI or CT-myelogram)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Able to ambulate without assistance and stand without assistance with participant eyes open for a minimum of 10 seconds
inclusion.label: not_met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has severe lower extremity weakness and urinary retention, which suggests difficulty walking.

exclusion.criterion: Lumbar/thoracic surgery or lower extremity surgery
exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: Patient had unresectable anaplastic astrocytoma s/p radiation, which suggests previous spinal cord treatment.

notes: Patient's severe lower extremity weakness and urinary retention may impact ambulation, but no clear indication of previous lumbar/thoracic surgery or BMI > 35.
